title: How to Use 7-Zip to Create Self Extracting excutables

steps.title: Find the Files, which can be anything, and then click the big green "Add" button.
steps.content: Find the Files, which can be anything, and then click the big green "Add" button.

steps.title: Make the archive format a .7z (under archive format of course) and look for the create SFX archive which should work after making the archive format .7z
steps.content: Make the archive format a .7z (under archive format of course) and look for the create SFX archive which should work after making the archive format .7z

steps.title: Set any other settings you might need
steps.content: Set any other settings you might need

steps.title: Click OK and you will be finished
steps.content: Click OK and you will be finished
